title: One Piece Episode #536 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A written review of One Piece Episode 536 discussing the battle between Zoro and Hody Jones. The reviewer notes that the episode felt 'a bit lazy, meandering around with the story itself' though it 'ramped things up a bit'. The overall sentiment was that the arc 'comes across as a fluffy and fun piece rather than something instrumental'.

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 523 – 538) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the first portion of the Fish-Man Island arc, covering episodes 523-538 which includes episode 536. The review discusses the arc's themes, character development, and story progression.
